attributes.action: Stop allowing wealthy Billionaires to buy our democracy
attributes.additional_details: There should never be a price to our democracy. It is vital that it remains this way in lieu of recent events in USA.
attributes.background: To close potential loopholes that allow wealthy foreign billionaires to buy their way to our democracy.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707189
